ComicInfo.Summary:
The 2 Brains of "Beast" Bracken!: After being shot with a shotgun, the inmate known as "Beast" Bracken loses his violent ways.
Let's Scare Lisa to Death: Arthur and Lisa spend a night in a haunted house for the promise of ten thousand dollars if they make it until morning.
How to Get Rid of a Corpse!: Jacques kills Eddie, but where can he hide the body?
ComicInfo.Writer: Carl Wessler,George Kashdan,Murray Boltinoff,Bill Dennehy,George Kashdan,Bill Dennehy,Carl Wessler
ComicInfo.Title: The 2 Brains of "Beast" Bracken!; Let's Scare Lisa to Death; How to Get Rid of a Corpse!
